Content.Text:
<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
How's everything going on your farm? I know it's
a lot of new stuff to take in, but I hope you're
doing well. Keep on bringing your items to ship!

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes, there's one thing I've been meaning to
pass along to all the farmers here.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Recently, many countries have put in requests
for specific items.
<PAGE>
It seems like they're really in a crunch to find
these items, so I made a list that all of you
farmers can take a gander at.
<PAGE>
You should think about filling some of these
requests. There's no rush, and hey, it's a seller's
market if you do.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. You can speak to me whenever I'm
here at the Information Desk to enquire about the
requests.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Choose <BLUE>Accept Request</BLUE> to view the list of
requests and take on the ones you think you can
fulfill.
<PAGE>
Also, countries with outstanding requests will be
marked on the Recommended Goods board, so
you can check there too.
<PAGE>
Let me send the <BLUE>Requests</BLUE> book to your
bookshelf. You can thumb through it if you need
to recall the basics.
<BLUE>Requests</BLUE> has been added to my bookshelf.
